forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with snow. High near -5C. Winds E at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of snow 100%. Snow accumulating 12-20cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow likely. High near 25F. Winds E at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of snow 100%. 5 to 8 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow likely. Low -6C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of snow 100%. Snow accumulating 7-12cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with snow. Low 23F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of snow 100%. 3 to 5 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow likely. High -1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 100%. 12-20cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of snow. High 31F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 100%. 5 to 8 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow in the evening will mix with rain at times overnight. Low -2C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 80%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow. Low near 30F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 90%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 2C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Temps nearly steady in the mid 30s. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain with some snow mixing in late. Low 1C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain with some snow mixing in late. Low near 35F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 100%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain and snow. High 3C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 100%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow. Temps nearly steady in the mid to upper 30s. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 100%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of snow. Low around 0C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 90%. Snow accumulating 7-12cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with snow. Low 34F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 100%. 3 to 5 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow. High 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain and snow. High 37F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers. Low -4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers. Low 26F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Scattered snow flurries and snow showers before noon. Becoming partly cloudy later. High -3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Scattered snow flurries and snow showers before noon. Becoming partly cloudy later. High 28F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 30%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low -8C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 19F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with snow showers or flurries. High around -5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers or flurries. High 24F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 60%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low -8C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 12-20cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low 19F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 5 to 8 inches.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers. High -3C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 7-12cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. High 28F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. 3 to 5 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers. Low near -5C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers. Low 24F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional snow showers. High -2C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Variable clouds with snow showers. High around 30F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Scattered flurries and snow showers. Low -6C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 30%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Scattered flurries and snow showers. Low 23F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 30%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional snow showers in the afternoon. High -2C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early, then some snow showers later in the day. High 29F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers. Low near -5C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers. Low 24F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.
